name: Calculator
description: Simple calculator project with basic operations, developed in ReactJS and Tailwind, with modern and responsive design.

name: Git Profile Viewer
description: React application that consumes the GitHub API to display user information, including repositories and profile, with a modern and responsive interface.

name: Wiki Repositories
description: React application that uses the GitHub API to search for repositories, allowing you to view details or remove them from an interactive list.

name: DIO Clone with Authentication
description: Project that replicates the DIO layout with complete functionalities, including registration, login and user authentication, using ReactJS, TailwindCSS and a local API configured with JSON-Server.

name: Linktree Clone with DragAndDrop
description: Linktree clone with features for adding website and social media links, as well as allowing you to reorder items using the drag and drop library

name: To Do List
description: A simple and efficient To-Do List application with drag-and-drop functionality for task reordering and the ability to mark tasks as complete
